channel.title: Lgbtq2s on Readers' Advisory blog
channel.description: Recent content in Lgbtq2s on Readers' Advisory blog

item.title: Natural order by Brian Francis
item.description: About the book Author: Francis, Brian, 1971- Title: Natural order Publication: Toronto : Doubleday Canada, 2011. ISBN 9780385671538. DAISY audio format narrated by Bennett McCardle. CELA library call number DA41407. 361 pages in the paper edition; 9 hrs., 39 mins. as a recorded book. About the story This is the beautifully moving life story of an 86-year-old woman named Joyce. Told in a series of flash-backs from her early girlhood in rural Southern Ontario, through her marriage and family life, to her widowhood and eventual death, it shows the evolution of a life filled with regret and fear of what the neighbours will think.

item.title: Let's explore diabetes with owls by David Sedaris
item.description: About the book Author: Sedaris, David. Title: Let’s explore diabetes with owls: Essays, etc. Publication: New York, NY : Little, Brown and Company, 2013. ISBN 9780316154697. DAISY audio format narrated by David Sedaris. CELA library call number DA53190. 275 pages in the paper edition; 6 hrs., 26 mins. as a recorded book. About the story This is a series of essays, read by the author and recorded at various times, some recorded live, some in studio.
